item.title: Exam Experience - 70-533 Implementing Microsoft Azure Infrastructure Solutions - (Post Jan 2018 Updates)
item.description: It also had a number of other concepts which have been migrated over that time into Azure Resource Manager as a deployment method. Initially that had me concerned as I came to Azure 12 months ago fresh onto ARM. It was new at first but I didn’t have any ASM baggage. I saw the exam still had lots of ASM content when I looked into it last summer. But there have been TWO updates to the exam since then.
